name: jQuery.boxModel
title: jQuery.boxModel
desc: Deprecated in jQuery 1.3 (see jQuery.support). States if the current page, in the user's browser, is being rendered using the W3C CSS Box Model.

examples.desc: Returns the box model for the iframe.
examples.code: $( "p" ).html( "The box model for this iframe is: " + jQuery.boxModel + "" );

examples.desc: Returns false if the page is in Quirks Mode in Internet Explorer
